alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 26 at 3:23PM EDT until September 27 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the beaches from Duck to Cape Hatteras. * WHEN...Through 9 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible due to ocean overwash resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevated water levels are likely beginning with this evening`s high tide, but only limited impacts are expected until Wednesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Duck NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.5 ft, Moderate 6.0 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.8 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 2.8 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/06 PM 6.0 2.3 1.8 3-5 Moderate 27/06 AM 6.1 2.4 2.2 6-7 Moderate 27/06 PM 6.3 2.6 2.1 8 Moderate 28/07 AM 6.0 2.3 1.8 7 Moderate 28/07 PM 5.7 2.0 1.4 6 Minor 29/08 AM 5.8 2.1 1.3 5-6 Minor Oregon Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.4 ft, Moderate 3.9 ft, Major 4.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/07 PM 2.5 1.9 1.6 1-2 None 27/06 AM 2.6 2.0 1.8 2 None 27/07 PM 2.5 1.9 1.6 1-2 None 28/07 AM 2.4 1.8 1.5 1 None 28/08 PM 2.4 1.8 1.5 1 None 29/08 AM 2.6 2.0 1.7 1 None Coast Guard Hatteras NC MLLW Categories - Minor 2.5 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 4.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/05 PM 1.8 0.6 0.8 1-2 None 27/06 AM 1.9 0.7 1.0 2 None 27/08 PM 2.0 0.8 1.0 2 None 28/08 AM 1.9 0.7 0.9 1-2 None 28/08 PM 1.9 0.7 0.8 1 None 29/08 AM 1.9 0.7 0.8 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
